component.name: OceanBioTimeStepFramework

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Definition of property name Method required

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Passive tracers transport time step.

parameter.name: TimeStep

component.name: OceanBioSpaceConfig
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBioSpaceConfig required

parameter.name: GridConfiguration
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfiguration required

parameter.name: MeanResolution
parameter.definition: Mean horizontal resolution of the ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristrics
parameter.definition: Description of the of the horizontal grid used for ocean biogeochemistry.

parameter.name: GridConfiguration
parameter.definition: Definition of property name GridConfiguration required

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of vertical levels in ocean biogeochemistry model.

parameter.name: GridCharacteristics
parameter.definition: Description of the vertical grid used for ocean biogeochemistry.

parameter.name: AppliedTo
parameter.definition: List of tracers to which damping is applied.

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: UpperLevel
parameter.definition: Upper level of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LowerLevel
parameter.definition: Lower level of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: MethodType
parameter.definition: Definition of property name MethodType required

constraint.name: if MethodType is "different from Ocean Tracers"

parameter.name: Method
parameter.definition: Description of the specificities of the transport method (compared to Ocean tracers one).
